naslov: Prekrasna kuća s bazenom 147 m2 + okućnica 860 m2, Istra (prodaja)
opis: KOMPLETNO NAMJEŠTENA PRIZEMNICA Otkrijte ekskluzivno naselje modernih vila smještenih u idiličnom prirodnom okruženju, gdje svaka kuća nudi savršenu simbiozu luksuza, privatnosti i povezanosti s prirodom, s naglaskom na kvalitetan životni stil. Kuća je kompletno dovršena i opremljena krajem 06/2024. * Dizajn i raspored: * Moderna prizemnica L-tlocrta * Prostrana terasa s ljetnom kuhinjom i prostorom za odmor * Odvojene zone: dnevni boravak (kuhinja, blagovaonica, WC) i noćni dio (3 spavaće sobe, 2 kupaonice) * Prostorije: * 3 spavaće sobe * 2 kupaonice + 1 toalet * Suvremeno opremljena kuhinja s ostavom * Dnevni boravak s garderobnim prostorom * Eksterijer: * Bazen veličine 9x3 m * Prostrana terasa i vrt * Vanjska kuhinja na terasi ispred dnevnog boravka – sudoper i plinski roštilj * Detalji nekretnine: * Ukupna stambena površina: 147 m² * Veličina parcele: 860 m² * Lokacija i prirodno okruženje: * Smještena u prekrasnom prirodnom okruženju na osami * Pogled na zelenilo sa svakog prozora i s prostrane terase * Projekt i izgradnja: * Izgrađene prve dvije vile od planiranih sedam * Sinergija privatnosti i povezanosti s prirodom i zajednicom * Životni prostor i pogodnosti: * 147 m² stambenog prostora na parceli od 860 m² * Moderna arhitektura s 3 spavaće sobe, 2 kupaonice, ljetnom kuhinjom * Bazen, prirodni materijali, savršeno za ljubitelje prirode i privatnosti Ova vila nudi kvalitetu s filtriranom i omekšanom vodom, kuhinjom opremljenom s naprednim uređajima poput hladnjaka s ledomatom, vinotekom, indukcijskom pločom te mikrovalnom i pećnicom. Interijer krasi raskošna dizajnerska rasvjeta, Vimar prekidači, ručno izrađeni namještaj od kvalitetnog drva, dok je sustav grijanja i hlađenja visoko efikasan zahvaljujući Viessmann toplinskoj pumpi i Mitsubishi klima uređajima. Bazen s hidromasažom i slanom vodom te elegancija interijera (dizajn poznate akademske umjetnice) i eksterijera dodatno ističu ekskluzivnost vile. Mjesto: Prva konoba/restoran nalazi se nedaleko od same kuće. Trgovina je udaljena 1500 m. Površina nekretnine: 147 m2 Površina okućnice: 867 m2 Spavaće sobe:  3 Energetski razred:  A+ Parkirna mjesta: 2 Udaljenost od mora: 10000 m Za sva pitanja kontakt telefon: 098 / 915 - 5643 (Ivan) LORETA NEKRETNINE Loreta Usluge Office: Tel: 01/3866-844 Zagrebačka avenija 100a, 10 000 Zagreb www.loreta-nekretnine.com FULLY   FURNISHED   SINGLE  -  STOREY   HOUSE Discover   an   exclusive   resort   of   modern   villas   located   in   an   idyllic   natural   environment  ,   where   each   house   offers   a   perfect   symbiosis   of   luxury  ,   privacy   and   connection   with   nature  ,   with   an   emphasis   on   a   quality   lifestyle  . The   house   is   completely   completed   and   equipped   at   the   end   of   06  /  2024  . *   Design   &   Layout  : *   Modern   single  -  storey   house   with   an   L  -  floor   plan *   Spacious   terrace   with   summer   kitchen   and   relaxation   area *   Separate   zones  :   living   room   (  kitchen  ,   dining   room  ,   toilet  )   and   night   area   (  3   bedrooms  ,   2   bathrooms  ) *Rooms: *   3   bedrooms *   2   bathrooms   +   1   toilet *   Modernly   equipped   kitchen   with   pantry *   Living   room   with   dressing   room *Exterior: *   Pool   size   9x3   m *   Spacious   terrace   and   garden *   Outdoor   kitchen   on   the   terrace   in   front   of   the   living   room   –   sink   and   gas   grill *   Property   Details  : *   Total   living   space  :   147   m  ² *   Plot   size  :   860   m  ² *   Location   and   natural   environment  : *   Located   in   a   beautiful   natural   environment   in   a   secluded   area *   View   of   the   greenery   from   every   window   and   from   the   spacious   terrace *   Design   and   construction  : *   The   first   two   villas   of   the   planned   seven   have   been   built *   Synergy   of   privacy   and   connection   with   nature   and   community   *   Living   space   and   amenities  : *   147   m  ²   of   living   space   on   a   plot   of   860   m  ² *   Modern   architecture   with   3   bedrooms  ,   2   bathrooms  ,   summer   kitchen *   Pool  ,   natural   materials  ,   perfect   for   nature   and   privacy   lovers   This   villa   offers   quality   with   filtered   and   softened   water  ,   a   kitchen   equipped   with   advanced   appliances   such   as   a   refrigerator   with   an   ice   maker  ,   a   wine   cooler  ,   an   induction   hob  ,   and   a   microwave   and   oven  .   The   interior   is   adorned with   luxurious   designer   lighting  ,   Vimar   switches  ,   handmade   furniture   made   of   quality   wood  ,   while   the   heating   and   cooling   system   is   highly   efficient   thanks   to   the   Viessmann   heat   pump   and   Mitsubishi   air   conditioners  . The   pool   with   hydromassage   and   salt   water   and   the   elegance   of   the   interior   (  designed   by   a   famous   academic   artist  )   and   exterior   further   emphasize   the   exclusivity   of the   villa  . Place:   The   first   tavern  /  restaurant   is   located   not   far   from   the   house  . A   shop   is   1500   m   away  . Property   size  :   147   m2 Total   plot   area  :   867   m2   Bedrooms  :   3 Energy   class  :   A+ Parking   spaces  :   2 Distance   from   Sea  :   10000   m For   all   questions   contact   phone  :   098   /   915   -   5643   (  Ivan  ) LORETA   REAL   ESTATE   Loreta   Services   Office  :   Tel  :   01  /  3866  -  844 Zagrebačka   avenija   100a  ,   10   000   Zagreb www.loreta-nekretnine.com ID KOD AGENCIJE: 250 Ivan Bošković Agent s licencom Mob: 098/9155-643 Tel: 01/3866 844 E-mail: ivan.boskovic@loreta.hr www.loreta.hr
